name: Expansion Demand
description: The citizens of your kingdom want expansion! If you successfully Claimed a Hex this turn, the result of your check for this event is improved one degree.

criticalSuccess.msg: Your citizens are pleased with the growth of the kingdom.

success.msg: You satisfy the citizens’ demands for growth, but if you don’t successfully Claim a Hex during your next Kingdom turn, @gain1Unrest

failure.msg: Your citizens remain unhappy with your kingdom’s growth. @gain1Unrest. If you don’t successfully Claim a hex during your next Kingdom turn, @gain1Unrest again.

criticalFailure.msg: Your citizens remain unhappy with your kingdom’s growth. @gain2Unrest. If you don’t successfully Claim a hex during your next Kingdom turn, @gain2Unrest again.

resolution: Achieve either a success or critical success at this event.
